column4: can someone tell me how to expand my FS3 partition that my root is in without needing a live CD?  I don't have blank disks, and I can't find the ones I had mailed to me
can someone kick irc_admin please?
that was what the "!ops" was all about
ahhh, sorry, I don't use IRC that much.  I'd love to learn how it works, but I can't find a lot of good documentation on it.
there's a bot, and commands to the bot are prefixed with an exclamation mark
do you know how to resize your root partition without needing a live CD?
you can /query the bot so if you want to poke it, it doesn't bother other users
nope, I've never resized a partition
ahhh, well, I don't have blank disk (well, I do, but they're dual layer DVDs), and I can't find the ones I had mailed to me.  I saw a "howto" on howtoforge.com, butI didn't know if it was any good
boot off a USB stick?
I'm using a Toshiba laptop.  (ie. the BIOS is as dumb as my mother)
that's not a very nice thing to say
have you ever had a set of disks mailed to you after requesting them on the website?
set of disks?
yes, requesting disk from the ubuntu site
never tried
I requested a server and desktop CD set, and I got stickers included!!!
it only takes about 7 minutes to download the ISO for me...
ahhh, but it looks soooo much better when you can go to a prespective client's place and just drop in a pressed disk!
true
and since it comes with stickers, it's easy advertizing
brb
yea, I did it!!!
I resized my root partition.  took forever, but it's done
